q: As in his book, Donald Rumsfeld was forthcoming with his criticism of public figures, including his felloGeorge H. W. Bush Cabinet members. Bush administration used as its primary public justification for conducting the war never turned up, he insists that removing Saddam Hussein legitimized the 2003 invasion anyway. I have no doubt that given the facts that were made available to George W. Bush in 2003, I would have made the same decision..., Donald Rumsfeld writes.
